page.title: 15HONEYPOT FARM.
page.content: Owned by 2 partners,1 in residence. {Land}covers 181.1 hectares; 100 grassed,remainder animal feed crops. Silage and swedes home use,barley for sale.Also 10 hectare pond with rainbow and brown trout. {Farm}stocked with 287 head{cattle- most Limousin and Charolais.86 Suffolk Cross{sheep,}and overwintering 1,600 {fat lambs,}Scotch Blackface and Cheviots.{Buildings;}3 Dutch barns, covered silage shed, slatted shed for 200,cubicle housing for 95,loose housing for 50 cattle;drying shed 160 tonnes barley,silo 95tonnes.{Equipment 8 tractors,1 combine harvester,silage cutter,plough,baler,bale collecter, spray,disc tiller,elevator,muck scaler,slurry spreader,turnip seeder and chopper,grubber,seed drill,welder, pasture topper,harrows,a wagon and 7 varied trailers.
